title: Multi-Agent & Custom Prompts Support
description: Add support for multiple LLM agents (codex, claude, gemini) and customizable review prompts. Enables teams to choose their preferred LLM and tailor review criteria.

title: Create internal/agent package structure
description: Set up internal/agent directory with package.go and foundational files

title: Define Agent interface
description: Define Agent interface with Name(), IsAvailable(), Execute() methods

title: Define OutputParser interface
description: Define OutputParser interface with ReadFinding(), Close() methods for streaming output

title: Implement CodexAgent
description: Implement CodexAgent maintaining exact current behavior (codex exec review --base X)

title: Implement CodexOutputParser
description: Implement JSONL parser for codex output format (agent_message items)

title: Refactor runner to use Agent interface
description: Update internal/runner/runner.go to use Agent.Execute() instead of direct codex exec

title: Add unit tests for agent package
description: Test CodexAgent and CodexOutputParser with table-driven tests

title: Integration test: verify no behavior change
description: Run full test suite + manual testing to ensure Phase 1 changes are transparent

title: Create internal/prompt package
description: Set up internal/prompt package with Builder type

title: Implement prompt Builder with template variables
description: Implement Builder.WithBaseRef(), Build() with {{base_ref}} substitution

title: Define default review prompt
description: Create DefaultReviewPrompt constant with comprehensive review criteria

title: Add review_prompt config option
description: Add review_prompt string field to internal/config/Config struct with YAML support

title: Add review_prompt_file config option
description: Add review_prompt_file string field and file loading logic to config

title: Add --prompt CLI flag
description: Add --prompt flag to cmd/acr/main.go with precedence over config

title: Add --prompt-file CLI flag
description: Add --prompt-file flag to cmd/acr/main.go

title: Update CodexAgent to use custom prompts
description: Modify CodexAgent.Execute() to pass prompt as positional arg: codex exec review 'PROMPT' --base X

title: Add tests for prompt system
description: Test prompt Builder, template substitution, config loading, CLI flags

title: Create example prompt templates
description: Add examples/prompts/ directory with security-focused, performance-focused templates

title: Update documentation for custom prompts
description: Update README.md and CLAUDE.md with prompt customization guide

title: Implement ClaudeAgent
description: Implement ClaudeAgent using 'claude -p --output-format=json PROMPT'

title: Implement ClaudeOutputParser
description: Parse Claude CLI JSON output format and normalize to domain.Finding

title: Implement GeminiAgent
description: Implement GeminiAgent using 'gemini -o json PROMPT'

title: Implement GeminiOutputParser
description: Parse Gemini CLI JSON output format and normalize to domain.Finding

title: Add agent config option
description: Add 'agent' string field to config.Config (default: codex)

title: Add --agent CLI flag
description: Add --agent flag to cmd/acr/main.go

title: Create agent registry/factory
description: Create agent.NewAgent(name) factory function with registry of available agents

title: Wire agent selection in main.go
description: Update cmd/acr/main.go to use agent factory based on config/flag

title: Add multi-agent tests
description: Test ClaudeAgent, GeminiAgent, agent factory, config resolution

title: Update documentation for multi-agent
description: Update README.md, CLAUDE.md with agent selection guide and examples
